threads: Abortion is health care & should be between a woman & her doctor, not left to politicians like Yvette Herrell who would ban abortion without exceptions for rape, incest or the life of the mother. #NM02
text: smh, why are we still fighting for basic rights in 2023? politicians like Herrell just don't get it. healthcare, including abortion, is a human right, full stop. why can't we prioritize empathy & understanding over control?   are non-negotiable. 😔✊
